report.name: prodec3_mens

dataSource.name: Q_prodec2
dataSource.select: SELECT lbi.codcamo dc_codcamo1, clm.clisigle dc_eclisigle, lbi.pnom dc_pnom, lbi.typproj dc_typproj, DECODE(SUBSTR(LPAD(:P_PARAM8, 7, '0'),6,2), '**', sti.sigdep||'/'||sti.sigpole, sti.libdsg) dc_libdsg, lbi.pid dc_pid, lbi.toptri dc_toptri, lbi.pobjet dc_pobjet, lbi.dpcode dc_dpcode, dop.dplib dc_dplib, lbi.icpi dc_icpi, pri.ilibel dc_ilibel, lbi.airt dc_airt, app.alibel dc_alibel, rtrim(res.rnom) dc_rnom, res.rprenom dc_reprenom, lbi.clicode dc_clicode, clm.clisigle dc_clisigle, lbi.pnmouvra dc_pnmouvra, lbi.astatut dc_astatut, lbi.codcamo dc_codcamo, pack_prodec2.decode_amortissement(lbi.typproj, lbi.astatut) dc_ammortissement, cea.ctopact dc_ctopact, tbs.typeb dc_typeb, decode(tbs.typeb, 'A', 'Budget prop fourn', 'B', 'Budget notifié', 'C', 'Budget arbitré', 'D', 'Budget réestime', 'E', 'Budget consommé') dc_typ_lib, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.histo) dc_histo, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.minus1) dc_minus1, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.n) dc_n, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.plus1) dc_plus1, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.plus2) dc_plus2, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.plus3) dc_plus3, pack_prodec2.f_formater_budget(tbs.total) dc_total, tcs.pid dc_pidtcs, tcs.typetap dc_typetap, tcs.id dc_id, ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -- dc_flag_type_sstache :Types de sous-tâches en fonction -- '1' => sous-tâche PROJET; '2' ==> sous-tâche SOUS-TRAITANCE ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ DECODE(RTRIM(SUBSTR(tcs.id, 3, 3)), NULL, '1', ' ', '1', '2') dc_flag_type_sstache, tcs.asnom dc_asnom, tcs.codsg dc_codsg, tcs.pnom dc_pnom, tcs.acst dc_acst, tcs.janv dc_janv, tcs.fevr dc_fevr, tcs.mars dc_mars, tcs.avril dc_avril, tcs.mai dc_mai, tcs.juin dc_juin, tcs.juil dc_juil, tcs.aout dc_aout, tcs.sept dc_sept, tcs.octo dc_octo, tcs.nove dc_nove, tcs.dece dc_dece FROM ligne_bip lbi, ressource res, centre_activite cea, application app, proj_info pri, struct_info sti, dossier_projet dop, client_mo clm, tmp_budget_sstache tbs, tmp_conso_sstache tcs WHERE lbi.codsg = sti.codsg AND lbi.dpcode = dop.dpcode AND lbi.icpi = pri.icpi AND lbi.airt = app.airt AND lbi.pcpi = res.ident AND lbi.clicode = clm.clicode AND lbi.pjcamon1= cea.codcamo(+) AND lbi.pid = tbs.pid AND lbi.pid = NVL(RTRIM(substr(tcs.id, 3, 4)), tcs.pid) AND tbs.numseq = :p_numseq_2 AND tcs.numseq = :p_numseq_1 &P_WHERE &P_ORDER_BY

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( SUBSTR ( LPAD ( : P_PARAM8 , 7 , '0' ) , 6 , 2 ) , '**' , sti.sigdep || '/' || sti.sigpole , sti.libdsg )
decode ( tbs.typeb , 'A' , 'Budget prop fourn' , 'B' , 'Budget notifié' , 'C' , 'Budget arbitré' , 'D' , 'Budget réestime' , 'E' , 'Budget consommé' )

cf_totalformula
function.textSource:
function CF_totalFormula return Number is begin
return (nvl(:CS_SST_JANV,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_FEVR,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_MARS,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_AVRIL,0)+ nvl(:CS_SST_MAI,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_JUIN,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_JUIL,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_AOUT,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_SEPT,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_OCTO,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_NOVE,0) + nvl(:CS_SST_DECE,0)); end;

function.textSource: function CF_SUM_TOTYP_SSTFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := NVL(:CS_TOTYP_JANV, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_FEVR, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_MARS, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_AVRIL, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_MAI, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_JUIN, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_JUIL, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_AOUT, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_SEPT, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_OCTO, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_NOVE, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTYP_DECE, 0); return(l_res); end;

function.textSource: function CF_SUM_TOTPROJFormula return Number is begin return( nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_JANV, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_FEVR, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_MARS, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_AVRIL, 0)+ nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_MAI, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_JUIN, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_JUIL, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_AOUT, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_SEPT, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_OCTO, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_NOVE, 0) + nvl(:CF_TOTPROJ_DECE, 0)); end;

function.textSource:
function CF_TOTFIN_TOTALFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_JANV, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_FEVR, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_MARS, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_AVRIL, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_MAI, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_JUIN, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_JUIL, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_AOUT, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_SEPT, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_OCTO, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_NOVE, 0) + NVL(:CS_TOTFIN_DECE, 0); return(l_res);
end;
